    • localHostSocketAddress

      ComException

      public static java.net.InetSocketAddress localHostSocketAddress​(int port) throws ComException
      Creates a new InetSocketAddress instance with localHostAddress() and the passed port value.
      Parameters:
      port - the port to be used.
      Returns:
      a localhost InetSocketAddress with the passed port value.

      ComException
